title: Add current principal as admin - Frontend verification

requirements.summary: Verify that the Admin Panel section becomes visible in the Settings screen after the user's principal is added as admin
acceptanceCriteria: The useAdminRole hook returns isAdmin: true for the user
The Admin Panel section with 'Manage Venues' button appears in SettingsAboutScreen
The admin check completes without errors

file_operations.description: Review and ensure the useAdminRole hook correctly calls the isCallerAdmin backend query and returns accurate admin status. Verify proper error handling and query invalidation when authentication state changes. The hook should remain enabled only when the actor is available and should handle loading states appropriately.

Verify that the Admin Panel section correctly uses the useAdminRole hook to conditionally render the admin interface. Ensure the 'Manage Venues' button and admin controls appear only when isAdmin is true and the loading state has completed. Add any missing error state handling for admin status checks.
